analysis.key_quote: This policy would make it easier for the administration to keep firing people and shutting down agencies and programs like the Peace Corps and Fulbright Program that have benefited thousands of Americans and protected the country by creating goodwill toward it around the world.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about the loss of institutional knowledge and the potential for increased politicization of the civil service, which undermines the merit-based system and employee rights.
